name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The unified attribute for the Raster Display

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 60.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 60.0

content.name: x_count
content.description:
the number of checkbox columns
default: 8

content.name: y_count
content.description:
the number of checkbox rows
default: 8

content.name: x_gappage
content.description:
the horizontal space between glowboxes
default: 0.1

content.name: y_gappage
content.description:
the vertical  space between glowboxes
default: 0.1

content.name: backing_colour
content.description:
the background colour of the list
default: {r:0.2, g:0.2, b:0.2, a:1.0}

content.name: pixel_colour
content.description:
the colour of the pixels in the display
default: {r:0.9, g:0.9, b:0.9, a:1.0}
